text:
Hi everyone,

I'm in need of assistance from someone familiar with HubSpot regarding the following issue. I'm not sure if this is the right place to ask, but here it goes.

I've built a web application using React and Node.js. In this app, I would like to include a URL to my HubSpot portal, which users can click on to be redirected. My requirement is that when the user clicks on the link, I want to handle the authentication programmatically (using client ID, secret, username, password, etc.) and then redirect them to the HubSpot portal.

I'd like to know if this is possible and if HubSpot provides any APIs for accomplishing this. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!
Anyone come across a way to block remote employees on dynamic IP from Google or HS Analytics? Only option currently available seems to be install a browser extension that blocks analytics

We are looking to dashboard our HubSpot inbox in a stand-alone local webpage (without logging in with user credentials). I don't see an endpoint that will show all open messages in the inbox. Can anyone point me to the "right" endpoint/approach?
We're simply looking for a list of open messages, and then a pane next to it showing message content.
Has anyone seen a "redirect error" with editing pages with the new beta page editor? Not sure what this means or how to fix. Thanks for any help you could offer.

It must mean I have to do this but its not clear of the source of the error. Is it a module.js or script file.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/provide-a-good-editor-experience#rendering-javascript-window-hsineditor>

Hi all! :wave:
Does any of you know if it is possible to change this default text in HubSpot? This is displayed when a user has previously opt out from any communication
Thank you :thanku:

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

Anyone have recommendations on a forum/discussion board platform that can be used on a HubSpot site? Client is looking for a pretty bare-bones way of letting users ask/answer questions, as a first line of support for their products

hi everyone,
I have a question regarding the HubSpot child theme. Currently, HubSpot restricts the ten child themes in the Enterprise subscription. Can we have more than 10 child themes?
I think it would be worth trying contact our success manager in HubSpot to look for the possibilities
Has anyone ever run into problems with connecting domains using cloudflare? HubSpot doesn't seem to be seeing the records I added.
Solved. HubSpot will not play with proxied DNS.

Hello team

Can you please anyone  help me to get this form data.

i submitted this form  many time.

How i can get this from data from HubSpot


Form Action:  <https://forms.hsforms.com/submissions/v3/public/submit/formsnext/multipart/20629345/76c817b6-62d2-4899-803c-a285de95bb67>
